name: It Takes 2
description:
The newest puzzle game with an interesting twist.
You control not one, but two character at the same time.

It Takes 2 - is a puzzle and strategy game that will challenge your mind.
This game tells a story of two individuals that wants to be together, but first they have to face a lot of challenge.
It seems very easy but still you have to use your eyes, mind and speed.

Eyes - to look for a place to hide and to avoid the enemies!

Mind - to think for a good strategy!

Speed - control both characters at the same time and to get rid of the enemies.

If you were looking for a game to play that's fun and strategic this is a nice one!

Features:
***FREE!
***Offline game
***Simple puzzles. But each puzzle is unique!
***Challenge your eyes, mind and speed!
***With a cute and colorful graphics
***Easy to control
***With power ups to help you solve the puzzle quickly!
***With different stages!
